name: sonobarr
description: Sonobarr is a self-hosted status and health dashboard for Sonarr/Radarr setups. It aggregates information, errors, and stats into a quick-glance bar-style UI.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Displays health status of Sonarr and Radarr instances

features.title: Error Monitoring
features.description: Shows recent errors and warnings from arr services

features.title: Queue Overview
features.description: Displays download queue status and progress

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Monitors available storage across media libraries

features.title: Service Stats
features.description: Displays library counts and recent activity

features.title: Multi
features.description: Monitors multiple Sonarr and Radarr servers

features.title: Compact Display
features.description: Presents information in space-efficient bar layout
